section.heading: Scope.
section.text: These regulations govern all persons licensed or applying for licensure by the Board.

para.text: The following fees are established by the Board:
Approval for CEUs to course sponsor — $50;
Penalty for failure to maintain correct address with the Board — $100; and
Interstate physical therapy licensure compact fee — $125.
The Federation of State Boards of Physical Therapy determines the fees for the National Licensure Examination for physical therapists and physical therapist assistants.
The Maryland Health Care Commission (MHCC) assesses a fee for health care professionals which the applicant shall pay at the time of license renewal as specified in COMAR 10.25.02.

section.heading: Refunds.
section.text: Fees paid to the Board are nonrefundable.

section.heading: Change of Fees.
section.text: Fees are subject to change by action of the Board of Physical Therapy Examiners. The Board shall notify licensees and applicants of changes.

annotations.annotation: Health Occupations Article, §§13-206, 13-207, and 13-3A-01(3)(d)(2), Annotated Code of Maryland
